column5: Don't Quads float if they go through? I thought the tires would hold them at the surface at the very least, even if upside down. I don't own one, so just asking.

Don't Quads float if they go through? I thought the tires would hold them at the surface at the very least, even if upside down. I don't own one, so just asking.  Some, very few of the light models will float if you have the extra large tires.
When they go upside down, its real hard to stay on the seat
I love attrition! It keeps the population in balance.  What a quadhopper

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=4zg3DSTG53I  Not sure if this was the same quad. The blue ice report posted the extraction process of a Quad on Cooks bay. Even just 4-5 FOW this looks like a massive pain in the butt.
What a pain.
The reason it looked so hard is because they don't have a clue how to do it properly. Much easier when you put up an A frame to get lift on the vehicle.

"The reason it looked so hard is because they don't have a clue how to do it properly.  Much easier when you put up an A frame to get lift on the vehicle."  Some up close experience Drifter.  I love when 3 guys are giving signals to the driver 20 feet away, Doesn't No sound like Go? Same thing goes for Whoe. A cluster f%^k.
Hard to find good ice not hard to find the idiots...ATV's already common guys be careful.

Be careful out there guys. A Quad went through the ice this morning about 100 yards off shore on cooks bay. I'm hearing the driver is safe. With the recent snow covering the ice it will be difficult to spot the sketchy ice.
natural selection
All that ice is sketchy..
All that ice is sketchy..  DUH!!!!
Common sense boyz

Wow unbelievable some people just do not get it specially on cooks bay if you do not see ice hut operators out there that should be telling you something like they say you cant fix stupid glad to hear no one was hurt.

There are already huts out off glenwoods smh, just because some of it is "safe" doesnt mean it all is. This happens every year and always will. If you have to go then take the necessary precautions, leave the machine at home for now.
Wha? You mean three inches of ice isn't enough to support a sled?!?! Why didn't anyone tell me.  ....... Oh....... Wait.......  Glad no one was hurt though.
~~~~I'll keep watching Phish Porn on TV. till it's safe, last weekend watch Leo, & Rod phishen for Gar
Wow..
Never fails ?
Chris Berman voice "COME ON MAN".  Boats work best on water and visa versa for all other machines.
I wonder if it suprised him when it broke or he said...yup, knew this was going to happen
I wonder if it suprised him when it broke or he said...yup, know this was going to happen He may have thought he brought his hover-craft. HH
I bet he feels pretty dumb right about now.  Seriously, these people breed.   Scary!  S.
I once made a mistake as well, fortunatley for me the only armchair quarterbacks I had to listen to were my family who were glad I was OK and didn't think I deserved to die because I made a mistake.
what the hell was he thinking.  Really, I mean, come on.  I know it happens every year, and it always will.  But this year is super sketchy, why would you bother runing a quad this early?
And all his friends showed up to get it out, thumbs up and NO CHARGES laid.  Stay tuned for more, as the darwin awards continue.
Who left that gate open?
Lake open last week.. Frozen now. YEP! Let's get out the ATV!! Probably the same knucklehead I saw driving in the dark without headlights the other night!

OK I was not going to comment but to know me is to like me I fished that area from an early teen till my mid 40s  Fished with some long time old timers who lived on Guest Rd BBP area  Old Howard God bless is still fishing, a hardy newf  ,,,his phrase was I start fishing when I stop seeing people fall thru the ice, and a damn good fisherman he is , taught me lots over the years   BUT ONE OF THE STUPIDIST THINGS I EVER SAW WAS JUST 3 YEARS BEFORE WE CAME UP HERE WE WERE WALKING OUT FROM IBP a MILE FROM WHERE WE LIVED ON A  WALKING CATTLE TRAIL TO FISH NOT FAR FROM SHORE WE ONLY WENT MAYBE 200 YARDS AND I TOLD MY SON IT IS NOT GOING TO HAPPEN AS SEVERAL HUNDRED YARDS OFF TO OUR RIGHT WE SAW THE STEAM COMING OF A MAN WHO HAD MANAGED TO GET HIMSELF BACK ONTO SOME SKETCHY ICE  AS WE TURNED TO GO BACK TO SHORE A SLEDDER WHO DID NOT NOTICE US TRYING TO WAVE HIM DOWN DROVE BY IN THE OPPOSITE DIRECTION AND BROKE ICE  HE TO GOT BACK TO SHORE MINUS HIS MACHINE  NAW summed it up the best,,
Some people eat stupid with a coal shovel.

~~~~I'll keep watching Phish Porn on TV. till it's safe, last weekend watch Leo, & Rod phishen for Gar   yeah, was very cool that they could see the gar gumming the minnow. right. below. the. gunwale.
Well said.
